headline: Barclays Raises the Firm’s PT on Essex Property Trust (ESS) Stock
summary: Essex Property Trust, Inc. (NYSE:ESS) is one of the Best Depressed Stocks to Buy Right Now. On January 13, Barclays lifted the firm’s price objective on the company’s stock to $292 from $290, while keeping an “Equal Weight” rating, as reported by The Fly.
